bio.introduction: Many people call me Axo and you can call me Axo if you want. Im from Malaysia.

skills.description: Im a linux user who using Fedora Spin XFCE desktop (main) and EndeavourOS Community Edition BSPWM base on Arch Linux (for networking)
Im good at making website by using html, css, and js like this page you see here.
Im also making game stuff using Godot, Unity (C#), LWJGL (Java), and Pygame (Python) but most of it project have been cancel...
I can say that i always do 3D model stuff in Blender because i will use my model to my game.
